text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump After the lay off

unemployment ran out...and some people didn't qualify for unemployment at all...and people returned to their previous jobs....and people took jobs less than they had due to COVID-19 

So your numbers are sorta like these numbers

inflated and exaggerated ‼ https://t.co/u7TF3CtaYO
